Package.name: Better_CAS_Environment

Key.Chinese: 清除任務資訊 %2img image='\a3\3den\data\cfg3den\history\deleteitems_ca.paa' align='Right' size='0.8' /%3

Key.Original: You have received a New Task
Friendly forces are very close to the target, Range may vary depends on the ordnance or ROE.
Key.Chinese: 友軍部隊非常接近目標，距離可能會根據彈種或交戰規則而改變。
發射 對地(A/G) 導彈。
投擲 (集束/通用) 炸彈。

Key.Original: Release multiple munitions in close succession.
Key.Chinese: 連續短時間內釋放多枚彈藥。

Key.Original: No ordnance remaining, can be used to against the specific target.
Key.Chinese: 沒有剩餘的彈藥可用於對特定目標。
彈藥在地面上的命中。(非官方證實)

Key.Original: How long the aircraft can be on station.
Key.Chinese: 飛機可以在站留多久時間。

Key.Original: Sighting of a specified reference point.

Key.Chinese: 目視 目標，相反詞 “No Joy”。

Key.Original: Give the plane clearance to attack.
Terminate the weapon release or mission.
Key.Chinese: 終止 武器釋放/任務。

Key.Original: Aircraft has reached IP begin to attack.
Key.Chinese: 飛機已達到IP，準備開始進行攻擊。

Key.Original: Aircraft has no fuel ,but return to base.
Key.Chinese: 飛機已無燃料，只能返回基地。

Key.Original: Continue present maneuver. does NOT imply clearance to engage.
Key.Chinese: 持續現有機動。 “無”開火許可。

Key.Original: Call to begin Lasing at the target.
Key.Chinese: 呼叫開始在目標上照射雷射。

Key.Original: Callout for marking target by Laser.
Key.Chinese: 以雷射照射標記目標的呼號。

Key.Original: You have begun Lasing the target.

Key.Chinese: 在目標上的雷射 (水平)/(垂直) 擺動。

Key.Original: When you spot the Laser designation.
Provide a short summary of how the attack is going to be performed.%1%1 1. Type of the control (1,2 or 3)%1 2. Kind of the Attack (BOT/BOC)%1 3. Ordnance requested on target
Key.Chinese: 提供攻擊方式的簡要摘要。%1%1 1. 控制類型 (1、2或3) %1 2. 攻擊類型 (BOT/BOC) %1 3. 對目標的武器選項

Key.Original: “Alt + LMB” on the map to set marker%1%1“Initial Point” or “Battle Position”.%1%1IP for FW aircraft (Planes), the IP is the starting point for the run-in to the target. %1%1BP for RW aircraft (Helis), the BP is where attacks on the target are commenced.
Key.Chinese: 在地圖上使用 “Alt + 左鍵單擊” 來設置標記%1%1 “起始點(IP)” 或 “戰鬥位置(BP)” 。%1%1對於 固定翼 (飛機) 的 起始點 (IP) ，是開始進入目標的位置。%1%1對於 旋翼機 (直升機) 的 戰鬥位置 (BP)，是對目標進行攻擊的 起點及待命位置。

Key.Original: Heading and Offset.%1%1The heading is given in degrees magnetic from the “IP to target” or the center of the “BP to the target”. %1%1The offset is the side of the “IP to target” line on which aircrews can maneuver for the attack.
Key.Chinese: “飛行方向” 和 “偏移”。%1%1飛行方向以指北針角度表示，從 “起始點 (IP) 到目標” 或 “戰鬥位置 (BP) 的中心到目標”。 %1%1“偏移” 是指在 “起始點到目標” 的一側，人員可以在該側 進行攻擊動作。
距離。%1%1“IP/BP -> 目標” 的距離。

Key.Original: Target Elevation.%1%1The target elevation is given in %2t %5%3Feet%4 Mean Sea Level (MSL) unless otherwise specified.
Key.Chinese: 目標高度。%1%1目標高度以 海平面 (MSL) 計算，除非另有指定，以%2t %5%3英尺%4為單位。

Key.Original: Target Description.%1%1The description should be specific enough for the aircrew to recognize the target.
Key.Chinese: 目標描述。%1%1描述應該要足夠具體，以便人員能夠識別目標。

Key.Original: Mark Type/Terminal Guidance.%1%1The type of mark the JTAC/FAC(A) will use (for example, smoke(WP), laser, or IR). %1%1If using a laser, the JTAC/FAC(A) will also pass the call sign of the platform/ individual that will provide terminal guidance for the weapon and laser code.
Key.Chinese: 標記方式/終端引導。%1%1JTAC/FAC(A)將使用的標記類型 (例如，煙霧 (WP) 、雷射 或 紅外線) 。 %1%1如果使用雷射，JTAC/FAC(A)還要提供 個人呼號/使用平台/武器終端引導 和 雷射代碼。

Key.Original: Friendlies bearing from the target.%1%1Cardinal/sub-cardinal bearing from the target (N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W, or NW) and distance of %2t %5%3closest friendlies%4 from the target in meters (e.g., “South 300”).
Key.Chinese: 友軍位置根據目標的方位。%1%1從目標的 基本/次基本 方位 (北、東北、東、東南、南、西南、西、西北) 和最近友軍離目標的距離，以公尺表示 (例如，“南方 300”) 以%2t %5%3最近的友軍%4為例。

Key.Original: Egress.%1%1These are the instructions the aircrews use to exit the target area.
Key.Chinese: Egress (撤離) 。%1%1這些是空中單位用來離開目標區域的指示。

Package.Key:
Supplies additional important information.%1%1 1.%2t %5%3Troops in Contact%4 or %2t %5%3Danger Close%4%1 2.Final Attack Heading (FAH) or altitude restrictions %1 3.Threat %1 5.Active gun target lines %1etc 提供額外重要資訊。%1%1 1. %2t %5%3處於交戰%4 或 %2t %5%3Danger Close%4%1 2. 最終攻擊方向 (FAH) 或 高度限制 %1 3. 區域威脅 %1 4. 正在使用的射擊槍線 %1等等 </Key
Friendly position (The closest one to the Target).%1GRID/TRP/bearing and range etc%1%1Marked by (smoke/VS-17 panel/beacon/GLINT/IR strobe etc.) 友軍位置 (最接近目標的) 。%1GRID/TRP/方位和距離 等等%1%1由 (煙霧/VS-17面板/信標/GLINT/紅外線頻閃器 等等) 標記。
Target location. (GRID/TRP/bearing and range etc) 目標位置 (GRID/TRP/方位和距離 等等) 。
Description of target%1Method used to mark ENY position. (IR, tracer etc) 目標描述%1標記敵人位置的方法（紅外線、曳光彈等等）
Type 1 : %1JTAC can see target and Aircraft, and is for individual attacks.%1%1Type 2 : %1JTAC can see either the target or the aircraft (one or the other, not both) and is for individual attacks he must have real time data for the target from FO (Forward Observer)/Scout.%1%1Type 3 : %1Multiple attacks within a single engagement, JTAC can't see the aircraft but %2t %6'RobotoCondensedBold_BCE'%3must have real time data%4 from FO/Scout. Type 1：%1JTAC能看到目標和飛機，並且用於個別攻擊。%1%1Type 2：%1JTAC可以看到目標或飛機(其中之一，而不是兩者兼具)，用於個別攻擊，他必須從FO(前線觀察員)/偵察兵那裡獲得實時目標數據。%1%1Type 3：%1在單一攻擊中進行多次攻擊，JTAC無法看到飛機，但%2t %5%3必須從FO(前線觀測員)/偵察兵%4那裡獲得實時數據。
What kind of the attack will be performed.%1%1BOT (Bomb on Target): %1Guns ,rockets and Laser guided ammunitions. %1Ex. Hydra70 GBU-12%1%1BOC (Bomb on Coordinate): %1GPS guided ammunitions. %1Ex. GBU-31 GBU-32 GBU-35 將執行何種攻擊。%1%1BOT (Bomb on Target): %1機槍、火箭和雷射制導彈藥。%1例如：Hydra70、GBU-12%1%1BOC (Bomb on Coordinate): %1GPS制導彈藥。%1例如：GBU-31、GBU-32、GBU-35
What ammunition will be droped. %1How many. %1How far. %1etc 將投放何種彈藥。%1用多少。%1多遠投放。%1等等
Game Plan 任務計劃
Initial Point\Battle Position “起始點(IP)” \ “戰鬥位置(BP)”
Heading from Target to IP/BP 從目標到 IP/BP 的方向
Distance between IP/BP and Target IP/BP 和 目標 的距離
Target elevation (in Feet) 目標高度 (英尺)
Target description 目標描述
Target Position (GRID) 目標位置
Mark method 標記方式
Friendly info 友軍資訊
Egress instructions 撤離指示
Remarks/Restrictions 額外資訊
“Aircraft call sign” / “Yours” “空中單位代號” / “你的代號”
Distance 距離
Mark Houses 標記房屋
Height 高度
Compass 指北針
Edit Grid 設置網格
Find Flat 尋找平地
- L. Click to add point\n- L. Drag to move point\n- R. Click to remove point - 左鍵 新增位置點\n- 左鍵 + 拖移 移動位置點\n- 右鍵移除位置點
- L. Drag to make the area\n- Ctrl + R. Dbl. Click to delete area - 左鍵 + 拖移 創建區域\n- Ctrl + 雙擊右鍵 移除區域
- L. Click to add point - 左鍵 新增位置點
- L. Click to place point\n- Hold L. Click to show Mil - 左鍵 放置位置點\n- 按住左鍵 顯示Mil
- L. Drag to make a grid\n- Ctrl + R. Dbl. Click on your grid to delete - 左鍵 + 拖移 創建網格\n- Ctrl + 雙擊右鍵 移除網格
- Mouse to move the scan area. - 移動鼠標來掃描區域
If you have only one point to measure, will draw a circle to tell you the concentric distance. If you have multiple, will tell you the distance of the lines. 如果您只有一個點要測量，將會繪製一個圓圈來告訴您同心距離。如果您有多個點，將告訴您這些線的距離。
Indexes the houses in the area you draw. You can change the color of the grid with the same way with the markers. 對您所繪制的區域中的房子進行標記。您可以更改網格的顏色使用與〝地圖標記〞相同的方式。
Draws the graph of the height between two points. 繪製兩點之間的高度圖。
Gives you the compass from the defined point. Supports both Degrees and Mil. 從指定點提供指北針。支援〝方位角〞和〝Mil〞兩種單位。
Makes a easy to recognize grid for your team. You can change the color of the grid with the same way with the markers. The grid size is determined on the current map zoom level. 為您的團隊製作易於識別的網格。您可以使用與標記相同的方式更改網格的顏色。網格大小根據當前地圖的縮放大小而定。
A quick way to check if the area is flat enough. Green means almost same height with the cursor position, red means higher, blue means lower. 快速檢查地形是否足夠平坦的方法。綠色表示與鼠標位置幾乎相同的高度，紅色表示較高，藍色表示較低。
Press %1 按 %1
離開畫面 離開畫面
Temperature : 氣溫 :
Humidity : 濕度 :
Wind : 風向 :
Fog : 霧氣 :
Visibility 視野可見度
Strong 強烈
Gentle 輕拂
Calm 無風
Haze 迷霧
Mist 薄霧
Clear 清楚
Very Bad 糟糕
Bad 差
Good 良好
Altitude: %1 高度: %1
Time: %1 時間: %1
GRID: %1 位置: %1
Fuel: %1%2 油量: %1%2
Toggle 切換
Switch Optic Mode 切換鏡頭模式
Tracker Box 人形追蹤框
Unit Tracker 友方追蹤
3D Compass 3D羅盤
Map Icon 地圖標記
LandMark Icon 地標圖示
Mouse Cursor 點擊標記
Zoom In 增加倍率
Zoom Out 減少倍率
Swich View Left 切換視角 左
Swich View Right 切換視角 右
Next Weapon Setup 下個武器配置
Set Touch Marker 設置點擊標記
Opacity 不透明度
Custom HUD Color 自訂HUD顏色
Rocket HUD 火箭 HUD
Show HUD 顯示 HUD
Select available Trait for Turret Control 選擇可控制砲塔的職位
Laser for Air Vehicles Laserdesignator 空中載具的雷射指示器效果
Laser for Laserdesignator 雷射指示器的 雷射效果
Laser Light Source for Laserdesignator 雷射指示器的 光源效果
Unit Render Range 單位顯示距離
Exclude AI Aircrafts have the Laser Effect 排除AI飛機具有 雷射效果
Available AI CAS via CAS Receiver AI執行CAS透過 CAS接收器
Spotlight on Ground Vehicle Turret 探照燈在 地面載具 炮塔上
Laser on Ground Vehicle Turret 雷射在 地面載具 炮塔上
